title: Strengthening Rural Livelihoods through Backyard Poultry Farming with Climate Adaptive Coop Solution

subtasks: Raise chickens in climate-adaptive sheds.
Ensure cross ventilation in poultry sheds.
Protect chickens from predators like cats and dogs.
Manage temperature stress by maintaining optimal temperature.
Provide adequate lighting for production and reproduction.
Implement DRE-integrated solutions for energy efficiency.
Manage waste and hygiene in the farming area.
Monitor and manage dietary needs of chickens.
Generate additional income through second livelihood.
Participate in capacity building and market linkages.
Learn about climate-adaptive poultry farming practices.
Understand the importance of cross ventilation and sheds.
Adopt energy-efficient solutions for poultry farming.
Connect with agricultural departments and foundations.
Observe and adopt Vaphti Yolli and Poultry Shed schemes.
Customize solutions based on recommendations.
Improve production and income through innovative practices.
Achieve higher incomes through sustainable farming.
Ensure cost-effectiveness in farming operations.
Diversify income sources with backyard poultry.
